Package fr.insalyon.messenger.net.server

Class HermesServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.insalyon.messenger.net.server.HermesServer
  • public class HermesServer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows to run the hermes server in order to allow client to connect to it to exchange messages in chats

      The associated mongoDB database
